name: Greener Grass
description:
Ever dreamed of making a difference on the world? Sometimes, it’s easy to be discouraged by the amount of change one person can make, but Greener Grass can help!

Join in on an educational, fun game focused on managing your own eco-factory! Disassembling waste, putting things together and making sure it all works in multiple interactive mini-games spread throughout the early access version of Greener Grass. So, come on over and try GG, it’s free!

GG is currently still in development by a team of students in the Netherlands. For any feedback, bug reports and questions, find us at creative7games@gmail.com
